LanguageData.Apparel_CommandoArmor.label: 阿萨利装甲
LanguageData.Apparel_CommandoArmor.description: The standart armor worn by Asari Commandos in the field. Light to wear, yet it offers good protection on the battlefield.
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.label: Power Armor
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmor.description: An advanced suit of armor powered by uranium. It is usually used by assault troops from advanced glitterworld planets.
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmorHelmet.label: Power Armor Helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_PowerArmorHelmet.description: The helmet part of power armor set. It is mostly used by heavy infantry.
LanguageData.InterstellarArmor.label: 星际装甲
LanguageData.Apparell_Tentakle.label: 恶魔装甲
LanguageData.Apparell_Tentakle.description: An awe inspiring tentakle. It makes your subject's hearts beat ever so faster around you.
LanguageData.Apparel_Tagelmust.label: 缠头巾
LanguageData.Apparel_Tagelmust.description: The tagelmust covers the head and prevents the inhalation of wind-borne sand by its wearers. Vastly appreciated by the desert travelers for its features.
LanguageData.Apparel_Ushanka.label: 阔毡帽
LanguageData.Apparel_Ushanka.description: Thick and soft hat of ancient design used to keep you warm during coldest winters. Slightly more durable than tuque.
LanguageData.Apparel_PC.label: 鸭舌帽
LanguageData.Apparel_PC.description: Peaked officer hat. Quite rare these days... Very light and comfy, made out of unknown material. Makes you look like real war hero.
